title: Job with Taint-Based Node Selection
description: Create a Job named ||batch-processor|| in namespace ||batch|| that runs ||5|| parallel pods with ||busybox:1.35||. Configure it to tolerate taint ||batch-node=processing:NoSchedule|| and ensure it completes ||20|| successful executions total.

prerequisites: NODE=$(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}'); kubectl taint nodes $NODE batch-node=processing:NoSchedule

steps: command: ['sh', '-c', 'echo Processing job $JOB_COMPLETION_INDEX; sleep 10; echo Complete']

validations.command: kubectl get job batch-processor -n batch -o jsonpath='{.spec.completions}'
kubectl get job batch-processor -n batch -o jsonpath='{.spec.parallelism}'
